data.title: Which among the following was the Capital of Bahamani Sultanate?
data.meta_description:
Gulbarga From 1347 to 1425 Gulbarga was the capital of Bahamani Sultanate
In 1425 Ahmad Shah shifted capital from Gulbarga to Bidar
data.text:
Q. Which among the following was the Capital of Bahamani Sultanate?

Answer: Gulbarga

Notes: From 1347 to 1425 Gulbarga was the capital of Bahamani Sultanate In 1425, Ahmad Shah shifted capital from Gulbarga to Bidar

2

The above question is part of 35000+ General Studies MCQ Series Course on GKToday Android app.
